title: people that use reddit should come to league of legends board with an open mind
body: now  i personally don't use reddit so  i have no idea what you experienced on there but whatever you felt about reddit- reddit users should come here with an open mind and give it a real chance to flourish. in all honesty i have  really enjoy using na boards and so far found it very user friendly and will do my best to help oce boards grow. (y)
